name: VR 3D/2D hybrid platformer prototype
description:
This is an experimental VR experience which combines 2D and 3D elements for a totally unique experience .  ( still unfinished , mostly missing SFX , an ending , and tutorials ). ! MUST HAVE A VR HEADSET !

Tested on Oculus Quest + Link , RTX 2060 Super . should also work on 1060 6GB and above .

Controls:

  • Movement - left analog stick
  • QuickTurn (3D Levels) - right analog stick
  • Jumping - A button
  • Sword Attack (2D) - B
  • Shoot Dagger (2D) - right lower trigger
  • Shoot Dagger (3D) - Aim with left hand + right lower trigger
  • Grab Stuff (3D) - Left/Right lower triggers
  • Super Slo-Mo (pause game) - Left menu button 
  • Back To Menu - M key (keyboard)
  • Quit Game - Q key (keyboard) 
    • built for seated playing , but should also work standing.

moving around in roomscale will probably cause issues , as the player collider isn't currently attached directly to the XR rig

*this game is about 6-10 minutes depending on your play style

Annoying music by: me;

Most Pixel art by : https://szadiart.itch.io/crystal-world-platformer-set !
Some models by : https://kenney.nl/
Most of the few SFX from : https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc2020/
